General.Name: I Jang Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: I Jang Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial storage equipment, and custom-made and household products worldwide. The company offers store display products, such as fruit, display, and flower racks; display, shopping basket, and mesh shop display stands; display tables; and wire rotary displays, as well as healthcare products comprising binder, shelves binder, and medical trolley carts; and shelving covers. It also provides moving storage rack systems, cylinder and cargo trolleys, warehouse cages, trolley and tool carts, and metal pallets for logistics and warehouses; and stainless steel trolleys and storage racks, working carts, stainless steel work tables, and storage racks for food services and restaurants. In addition, the company offers customized display stands, AGV pallets, and foldable display racks. Further, it provides home furniture products, such as wagons, heavy duty and corner shelving, slimline and other shelving, and magazine racks. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Changhua City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.4, Hsing Kung Road, Changhua, Taiwan, 523
